questions.question: Do you prefer a male or female character?
answers: I strongly prefer a male character
I prefer a male character, but it's not essential.
I strongly prefer a female character.
I prefer a female character, but it's not essential.
I don't lean either way. Recommend me a character without considering this.

questions.question: Do you want DLC characters, including crossovers, recommended to you?
answers: Absolutely, I am willing to buy DLC if the character fits my playstyle.
I'm ok with it, but please prioritize non-DLC characters.
Please recommend me characters in the base game. I don't want to buy DLC.

questions.question: During a round, what would be your primary goal/something you enjoy most?
answers: Landing flashy, high damage combos to take the lead.
Dashing in and out as I chip my opponent down.
Getting close and personal with my opponent through aggression.
Waiting for my overzealous opponent to make mistakes that I can capitalize on.
I enjoy everything, please choose a versatile character for me.

questions.question: What would be your secondary goal/something you enjoy next? (You can choose the same thing)
answers: Landing flashy, high damage combos to take the lead.
Dashing in and out as I chip my opponent down.
Getting close and personal with my opponent through aggression.
Waiting for my overzealous opponent to make mistakes that I can capitalize on.
I enjoy everything, please choose a versatile character for me.

questions.question: What would be your ideal offensive method??
answers: I would strike the moment the opponent overextends and whiffs a move.
A devastating counterhit when my opponent tries to attack.
Aggressive mixups that will keep them guessing.
Grappling and throwing is the way to go - you can't break them all.
Mindgames from plus frames that will suffocate the opponent to death.
Poking down the opponent down with a series of low risk moves.
So many options, I would like a character that can specialize in everything.
